snippet: Local investors will be allowed to buy shares with existing cash holdings, but not to withdraw money from Greek bank accounts to buy shares.
abstract: Greece's stock market will reopen after five-week closure, but local investors will have restrictions.
lead_paragraph: Local investors will be allowed to buy shares with existing cash holdings, but not to withdraw money from Greek bank accounts to buy shares.

headline.main: Greek Markets Set to Reopen, With an Asterisk
headline.print_headline: Greek Markets Set to Reopen, With an Asterisk
